scripts.test:dev: cross-env CYPRESS_ENV=dev npx cypress open --browser electron
scripts.test:stg: cross-env CYPRESS_ENV=stg npx cypress open --browser electron
scripts.test:prod: cross-env CYPRESS_ENV=prod npx cypress open --browser electron
scripts.test:lexgpt: cross-env CYPRESS_ENV=stg npx cypress run --spec 'cypress/e2e/lexgpt/lexgpt_ask_questions.cy.js' --browser chrome --headless
